name: People Registry
description: Keep track of people mentioned in conversations. Stina can remember names, relationships, and details about the people in your life.

tools.name: List People
tools.description: Search and list people in the registry. Can filter by name.

tools.name: Get Person
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific person by ID or name.

tools.name: Add/Update Person
tools.description: Add a new person or update an existing person's information.

tools.name: Delete Person
tools.description: Remove a person from the registry.

i18n.en: You have access to a People Registry that helps you remember people the user mentions. When the user talks about someone new, use people_upsert to save their information. When they mention someone you might know about, use people_get or people_list to recall details. Always be helpful in maintaining accurate information about the people in the user's life.
i18n.sv: Du har tillgång till ett Personregister som hjälper dig komma ihåg personer som användaren nämner. När användaren pratar om någon ny, använd people_upsert för att spara deras information. När de nämner någon du kanske känner till, använd people_get eller people_list för att hämta detaljer. Var alltid hjälpsam med att hålla korrekt information om personerna i användarens liv.
